summary: A mystic-infused love story that follows a young couple's journey to India to collect their adopted baby.
cast: Radha Mitchell|Joel Edgerton|Samrat Chakrabarti|Isabel Lucas|Tillotama Shome|Barun Chanda|Dana Roy|Tamal Ray Chowdhury|Tanushree Shankar|Palomi Ghosh|Kalyan Chatterjee|Kamalendu Banerjee|Jeremy Sims|Shankar Haldar|Soumitra Saha|Sayfed Samseer Ali|Scott Bendall|Babu Datta|Sayaree Dutta|Sahira Bibi|Neelu Manna|Shelly Sanyal|Soma Das|Sanchita Saha|Deeya Sengupta|Amalendu Chatterjee|Biba Diswas|Raja Biswas|Bejoya Pain|Amarnath Mukherjee|Surojit Malakar|Aronya Mitra|Basu Deb Baul|Anna Broadbent|John Bose|Avinash Chordia|Tanaji Dasgupta|Anasuya Sengupta|Saptarshi Bhattarjee|Claire Tonna|Onerio Neto|Rachel Wood|Richard Storrs|Lighthouse for the Blind|Chelta Krishti Sangsad|Garden High School
title: The Waiting City
